Package DBImplementation

Class OverseerDBImplementation

java.lang.Object
DBImplementation.OverseerDBImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
OverseerControllable
public class OverseerDBImplementation extends Object implements OverseerControllable
Implements the functionality for managing Overseer objects in the database.
